name: Dashbound (Homestuck Theme)
description:
Homestuck the fuck out of your dashboard, MSPA reader!

The avatars, post icons and arrow selectors from my bubblr theme.

(Post Numbers do not actually look weird; It's the jpeg compression on the screenshot)

Now works with new Tumblr layout! :)
additional_info:
Will probably not be updated beyond this point.

Icons from Homestuck and tumblr.

Adding the fix for the new tumblr layout.
